name: LEAD Consult
description: LEAD Consult is one of the leading Allegro ETRMS and IT Integration Companies in Europe, with offices in Sofia, Bulgaria and Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Our unique knowledge of the financial and energy sectors, combined with the in-depth technological know-how enables LEAD Consult to provide the most efficient and valuable service to its customers. Our core areas of service software Development, Nearshoring, and Outsourcing; ETRM Integration; Financial IT Consulting; Data Integration.
